about_the_game:
This DLC contains the brand-new Ring Mode.

You will experience what’s it like to be immortal in this mode and enjoy the fun of using your card deck to defeat strong opponents

What’s more, there are three new equips and six new achievements in this mode for you to obtain.

After unlocking them, you can receive the special support from western heroes in Adventure Mode.

----Warrior Recruitment！！！



Do you want to know what’s it like to be immortal?

Do you want to push your limits?

Have you ever imagined you standing on the top of the Ring stage and having everyone calling out your name?

Come and join the Ring Conquest in Papercraft!

If you are a senior player,

you can use your wisdom to build your best card deck

and refresh your best record by defeating legendary opponents!

If you are a novice,

don’t be afraid. Battle with strong opponents will be your best chance to improve yourself!

On the stage of Ring Conquest,

you can use your strength to defeat strong opponents,

use your wisdom to get to the top,

or unlock new achievements and obtain rewards

to make your journey in Papercraft more fabulous!

————— Papercraft Warrior Recruitment for The Ring Conquest

name: Papercraft：Ring Mode（擂台争霸）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2DUO
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio

publishers: Shenzhen Tanyu Interactive Entertainment Co., Ltd.
short_description: This DLC contains the brand-new Ring Mode. You will experience what’s it like to be immortal in this mode and enjoy the fun of using your card deck to defeat strong opponents. The Ring Mode is good for novices to learn the combat system of Papercraft quickly.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
